meanings.definition: A condition in which the immune system reacts abnormally to a foreign substance.
meanings.sent1: Her allergies acted up when she was near cats.
meanings.sent2: My brother has severe allergies to peanuts.
meanings.sent3: Even though it's just pollen, his allergies make it seem like a monster attacking him.
meanings.sent4: His allergies to seafood were like a barrier preventing him from enjoying the beach.
meanings.sent5: The allergies made her eyes swell and itch uncontrollably.

meanings.definition: A strong dislike or aversion to something.
meanings.sent1: His allergies to horror movies made him avoid them at all costs.
meanings.sent2: She had allergies to public speaking, so she always felt nervous.
meanings.sent3: His allergies to vegetables were so strong that he joked about being a vegetable vampire.
meanings.sent4: The allergies to exercise were like a convenient excuse for him to skip the gym.
meanings.sent5: Her allergies to early mornings were evident as she hit the snooze button repeatedly.
